Summary: A long object with lights moving around the bottom. moving very slow. just over the tree tops.
divs: Sighting Detailson oct.7,my mom and me were coming home from my sisters. When we came across brownwood rd . I noticed something in the sky. I asked my mom what is that she looked and she said right away that is a ufo. we pulled of the road and watched it for at leasted 5 to 10 minutes. it was long way longer than a airplane and it had lights. I looking at mom when I first noticed it and i just new it was a ufo.It was very long and green,blue and white lights were under it. it was moving very slow. I thought it was very cool this is the first one i have seen and I beleive they are here and they live among us. we just wish they would reveal themselves to us. They have not causted any problems that we are awear of. The ufo just disapeared .
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Madison
There were no other sightings in Madison on or around October 7th 2011
